articleinfo.title: Bibliography according to ISO 690 and ISO 690-2 standards

sect1.title: Introduction
sect1.para: Examples are adapted from ISO 690 and ISO 690-2 standards.
Elements marked with * are optional, + marks mandatory elements for online documents and optional for others.

sect1.title: Monographs
sect1.para: Non-serial bibliographic item, i.e. an item either complete in one part or complete (or intended to be completed) in a finite number of separate parts.

tr.td: Translated by AN. Dellis; edited by SM. Hamberger
Translation of: Ciklotronnye volny v plasme

example.title: DocBook source code
example.programlisting: <biblioentry role="monograph"> <author> <surname>Lominadze</surname> <firstname>DG.</firstname> </author> <title>Cyclotron waves in plasma</title> <bibliomisc role="secondary">Translated by AN. Dellis</bibliomisc> <bibliomisc role="secondary">edited by SM. Hamberger</bibliomisc> <edition>1st ed.</edition> <publisher> <publishername>Pergamon Press</publishername> <address><city>Oxford</city></address> </publisher> <pubdate>1981</pubdate> <pagenums>206 p.</pagenums> <bibliomisc role="serie">International series in natural philosophy</bibliomisc> <bibliomisc>Translation of: Ciklotronnye volny v plasme</bibliomisc> <biblioid class="isbn">0-08-021680-3</biblioid> </biblioentry>

example.title: Output according to ISO 690 standard
example.para: LOMINADZE, DG. Cyclotron waves in plasma. Translated by AN. Dellis; edited by SM. Hamberger. 1st ed. Oxford: Pergamon Press, 1981. 206 p. International series in natural philosophy. Translation of: Ciklotronnye volny v plasme. ISBN 0-08-021680-3.

sect1.title: Serials
sect1.para: Publication, in any medium, issued in successive parts, usually having numeric or chronological designations, and intended to be continued indefinitely.

tr.td: Manufacturing and Primary Industries Division, Statistics Canada

example.title: DocBook source code
example.programlisting: <biblioentry role="serial"> <title>Communications equipment manufacturers</title> <bibliomisc role="secondary">Manufacturing and Primary Industries Division, Statistics Canada</bibliomisc> <edition>Preliminary edition</edition> <pubdate role="issuing">1970-</pubdate> <publisher> <publishername>Statistics Canada</publishername> <address><city>Ottawa</city></address> </publisher> <pubdate>1971-</pubdate> <bibliomisc role="serie">Annual census of manufacturers</bibliomisc> <bibliomisc>Text in English and French</bibliomisc> <biblioid class="issn">0700-0758</biblioid> </biblioentry>

example.title: Output according to ISO 690 standard
example.para: Communications equipment manufacturers. Manufacturing and Primary Industries Division, Statistics Canada. Preliminary edition. 1970- . Ottawa: Statistics Canada, 1971- . Annual census of manufacturers. Text in English and French. ISSN 0700-0758.

example.title: DocBook source code
example.programlisting: <biblioentry role="part"> <authorgroup> <author> <surname>Parker</surname> <firstname>TJ.</firstname> </author> <author> <surname>Haswell</surname> <firstname>WD.</firstname> </author> </authorgroup> <title>A text-book of zoology</title> <edition>5th ed.</edition> <volumenum>vol. 1</volumenum> <bibliomisc role="secondary">revised by WD. Lang</bibliomisc> <publisher> <publishername>Macmillan</publishername> <address><city>London</city></address> </publisher> <pubdate>1930</pubdate> <bibliomisc role="secnum">Section 12</bibliomisc> <bibliomisc role="sectitle">Phylum Mollusca</bibliomisc> <pagenums>p. 663-782</pagenums> </biblioentry>

example.title: Output according to ISO 690 standard
example.para: PARKER, TJ. and HASWELL, WD. A text-book of zoology. 5th ed., vol. 1. revised by WD. Lang. London: Macmillan, 1930. Section 12, Phylum Mollusca, p. 663-782.

sect1.title: Contributions to monographs
sect1.para: Contribution is independent unit forming part of a document.

example.title: DocBook source code
example.programlisting: <biblioentry role="contribution"> <biblioset relation="part"> <author> <surname>Wrigley</surname> <firstname>EA.</firstname> </author> <title>Parish registers and the historian</title> </biblioset> <biblioset relation="book"> <author> <surname>Steel</surname> <firstname>DJ.</firstname> </author> <title>National index of parish registers</title> <publisher> <publishername>Society of Genealogists</publishername> <address><city>London</city></address> </publisher> <pubdate>1968</pubdate> <volumenum>vol. 1</volumenum> <pagenums>p. 155-167</pagenums> </biblioset> </biblioentry>

example.title: Output according to ISO 690 standard
example.para: WRIGLEY, EA. Parish registers and the historian. In STEEL, DJ. National index of parish registers. London: Society of Genealogists, 1968, vol. 1, p. 155-167.

tr.td: Year, Issue designation, Pagination of the part

example.title: DocBook source code
example.programlisting: <biblioentry role="article"> <biblioset relation="article"> <author> <surname>Weaver</surname> <firstname>William</firstname> </author> <title>The collectors</title> <subtitle>command performances</subtitle> <bibliomisc role="secondary">Photography by Robert Emmett Bright</bibliomisc> </biblioset> <biblioset relation="journal"> <title>Architectural Digest</title> <pubdate>December 1985</pubdate> <volumenum>vol. 42</volumenum> <issuenum>no. 12</issuenum> <pagenums>p. 126-133</pagenums> </biblioset> </biblioentry>

example.title: Output according to ISO 690 standard
example.para: WEAVER, William. The collectors: command performances. Photography by Robert Emmett Bright. Architectural Digest. December 1985, vol. 42, no. 12, p. 126-133.

td.emphasis: Anordnung zur lichtelektrischen Erfassung der Mitte eines Lichtfeldes

tr.td: Erfinder: W. FEIST, C. WAHNERT, E. FEISTAUER
Date of publication of cited document

example.title: DocBook source code
example.programlisting: <biblioentry role="patent"> <corpauthor>Carl Zeiss Jena, VEB</corpauthor> <title>Anordnung zur lichtelektrischen Erfassung der Mitte eines Lichtfeldes</title> <bibliomisc role="secondary">Erfinder: W. FEIST, C. WAHNERT, E. FEISTAUER</bibliomisc> <bibliomisc>Int. Cl.<superscript>3</superscript>: G02 B 27/14</bibliomisc> <address> <country>Schweiz</country> </address> <bibliomisc role="patenttype">Patentschrift</bibliomisc> <biblioid class="other" otherclass="patentnum">608 626</biblioid> <pubdate>1979-01-15</pubdate> </biblioentry>

example.title: Output according to ISO 690 standard
example.para: CARL ZEISS JENA, VEB. Anordnung zur lichtelektrischen Erfassung der Mitte eines Lichtfeldes. Erfinder: W. FEIST, C. WAHNERT, E. FEISTAUER. Int. Cl.3: G02 B 27/14. Schweiz Patentschrift, 608 626. 1979-01-15.

tr.td: Also available in PostScript and ASCII versions from Internet: <ftp://ftp.Germany.EU.net/pub/books/carroll/>

example.title: DocBook source code
example.programlisting: <biblioentry role="monograph"> <author> <surname>Carroll</surname> <firstname>Lewis</firstname> </author> <title>Alice's Adventures in Wonderland</title> <bibliomisc role="medium">online</bibliomisc> <edition>Textinfo ed. 2.1</edition> <publisher> <publishername>Windspiel</publishername> <address><city>[Dortmund, Germany]</city></address> </publisher> <pubdate>November 1994</pubdate> <date role="cit">10 February 1995</date> <biblioid class="uri"><ulink url="http://germany.eu.net/books/carroll/alice/html"/></biblioid> <biblioid class="uri">in PostScript and ASCII versions from Internet<ulink url="ftp://ftp.Germany.EU.net/pub/books/carroll/"/></biblioid> </biblioentry>

example.title: Output according to ISO 690-2 standard
example.para: CARROLL, Lewis. Alice's Adventures in Wonderland [online]. Textinfo ed. 2.1. [Dortmund, Germany]: Windspiel, November 1994 [cited 10 February 1995]. Available from World Wide Web: <http://germany.eu.net/books/carroll/alice/html>. Also available in PostScript and ASCII versions from Internet: <ftp://ftp.Germany.EU.net/pub/books/carroll/>.

sect2.title: Parts of monographs, databases and computer programs

example.title: DocBook source code
example.programlisting: <biblioentry role="part"> <author> <surname>Carroll</surname> <firstname>Lewis</firstname> </author> <title>Alice's Adventures in Wonderland</title> <bibliomisc role="medium">online</bibliomisc> <edition>Textinfo ed. 2.2</edition> <publisher> <publishername>Windspiel</publishername> <address><city>[Dortmund, Germany]</city></address> </publisher> <pubdate>November 1994</pubdate> <date role="cit">30 March 1995</date> <bibliomisc role="secnum">Chapter VII</bibliomisc> <bibliomisc role="sectitle">Mad Tea-Party</bibliomisc> <biblioid class="uri"><ulink url="http://germany.eu.net/books/carroll/alice_10.html#SEC13"/></biblioid> </biblioentry>

example.title: Output according to ISO 690-2 standard
example.para: CARROLL, Lewis. Alice's Adventures in Wonderland [online]. Textinfo ed. 2.2. [Dortmund, Germany]: Windspiel, November 1994 [cited 30 March 1995]. Chapter VII, Mad Tea-Party. Available from World Wide Web: <http://germany.eu.net/books/carroll/alice_10.html#SEC13>.

sect2.title: Contributions to monographs, databases and computer programs

example.title: DocBook source code
example.programlisting: <biblioentry role="contribution"> <biblioset relation="part"> <author> <surname>McConnell</surname> <firstname>W. H.</firstname> </author> <title>Constitutional History</title> </biblioset> <biblioset relation="book"> <title>The Canadian Encyclopedia</title> <bibliomisc role="medium">CD-ROM</bibliomisc> <edition>Macintosh version 1.1</edition> <publisher> <publishername>McClelland & Stewart</publishername> <address><city>Toronto</city></address> </publisher> <pubdate>c1993</pubdate> <biblioid class="isbn">0-7710-1932-7</biblioid> </biblioset> </biblioentry>

example.title: Output according to ISO 690-2 standard
example.para: MCCONNELL, W. H. Constitutional History. In The Canadian Encyclopedia [CD-ROM]. Macintosh version 1.1. Toronto: McClelland & Stewart, c1993. ISBN 0-7710-1932-7.

tr.td: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

example.title: DocBook source code
example.programlisting: <biblioentry role="serial"> <title>Journal of Technology Education</title> <bibliomisc role="medium">online</bibliomisc> <publisher> <publishername>Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University</publishername> <address><city>Blacksburg (Va.)</city></address> </publisher> <pubdate>1989-</pubdate> <date role="cit">15 March 1995</date> <bibliomisc>Semi-annual</bibliomisc> <biblioid class="uri"><ulink url="gopher://borg.lib.vt.edu:edu:70/1/jte"/></biblioid> <biblioid class="issn">1045-1064</biblioid> </biblioentry>

example.title: Output according to ISO 690-2 standard
example.para: Journal of Technology Education [online]. Blacksburg (Va.): Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, 1989- [cited 15 March 1995]. Semi-annual. Available from Internet: <gopher://borg.lib.vt.edu:edu:70/1/jte>. ISSN 1045-1064.

tr.td: Using the World-Wide Web to Deliver Complex Electronic Documents: Implications for Libraries

example.title: DocBook source code
example.programlisting: <biblioentry role="article"> <biblioset relation="article"> <author> <surname>Price-Wilkin</surname> <firstname>John</firstname> </author> <title>Using the World-Wide Web to Deliver Complex Electronic Documents</title> <subtitle>Implications for Libraries</subtitle> </biblioset> <biblioset relation="journal"> <title>The Public-Access Computer Systems Review</title> <bibliomisc role="medium">online</bibliomisc> <pubdate>1994</pubdate> <date role="cit">1994-07-28</date> <volumenum>vol. 5</volumenum> <issuenum>no. 3</issuenum> <pagenums>pp. 5-21</pagenums> <biblioid class="uri"><ulink url="gopher://info.lib.uh.edu:70/00/articles/e-journals/uhlibrary/pacsreview/v5/n3/pricewil.5n3"/></biblioid> <biblioid class="issn">1048-6542</biblioid> </biblioset> </biblioentry>

example.title: Output according to ISO 690-2 standard
example.para: PRICE-WILKIN, John. Using the World-Wide Web to Deliver Complex Electronic Documents: Implications for Libraries. The Public-Access Computer Systems Review [online]. 1994, vol. 5, no. 3 [cited 1994-07-28], pp. 5-21. Available from Internet: <gopher://info.lib.uh.edu:70/00/articles/e-journals/uhlibrary/pacsreview/v5/n3/pricewil.5n3>. ISSN 1048-6542.

sect1.title: Electronic bulletin boards, discussion lists and electronic messages

example.title: DocBook source code
example.programlisting: <biblioentry role="messagesystem"> <title>PACS-L (Public Access Computer Systems Forum)</title> <bibliomisc role="medium">online</bibliomisc> <publisher> <publishername>University of Houston Libraries</publishername> <address><city>Houston (Tex.)</city></address> </publisher> <pubdate>June 1989-</pubdate> <date role="cit">17 May 1995</date> <biblioid class="uri"><ulink url="listserv@unhupvm1.uh.edu"/></biblioid> </biblioentry>

example.title: Output according to ISO 690-2 standard
example.para: PACS-L (Public Access Computer Systems Forum) [online]. Houston (Tex.): University of Houston Libraries, June 1989- [cited 17 May 1995]. Available from Internet: <listserv@unhupvm1.uh.edu>.

example.title: DocBook source code
example.programlisting: <biblioentry role="message"> <biblioset relation="part"> <author> <surname>Parker</surname> <firstname>Elliot</firstname> </author> <title>Re: Citing Electronic Journals</title> </biblioset> <biblioset relation="book"> <title>PACS-L (Public Access Computer Systems Forum)</title> <bibliomisc role="medium">online</bibliomisc> <publisher> <publishername>University of Houston Libraries</publishername> <address><city>Houston (Tex.)</city></address> </publisher> <pubdate>24 November 1989; 13:29:35 CST</pubdate> <date role="cit">1 January 1995; 16:15 EST</date> <biblioid class="uri"><ulink url="telnet://brsuser@a.cni.org"/></biblioid> </biblioset> </biblioentry>

example.title: Output according to ISO 690-2 standard
example.para: PARKER, Elliot. Re: Citing Electronic Journals. In PACS-L (Public Access Computer Systems Forum) [online]. Houston (Tex.): University of Houston Libraries, 24 November 1989; 13:29:35 CST [cited 1 January 1995; 16:15 EST]. Available from Internet: <telnet://brsuser@a.cni.org>.
